mention.text: Hong Kong Governor Chris Patten instead of saying thank you to Hong Kong Governor Chris Patten
Chris Patten , the last governor of Hong Kong
the last governor of Hong Kong
Chris Patten , who has been driven to the wall
the end on the Hong Kong issue
Britain position in China and Asia
the `` governor '' to show the power and prestige of the British Empire and go on playing the tyrant in China and Asia as a colonialist In this respect , what Chris Patten meant
Hong Kong Governor Chris Patten article

the right word for Mr. Patten himself Mr. Patten himself threatened that if China did not obey the `` governor 's '' arrangement , China should not expect Britain would agree to China return to GATT Although Chris Patten has taken great pains to protect the interests of the British Empire , Hong Kong Governor Chris Patten is not admired by some domestic opinion Instead , Hong Kong Governor Chris Patten has been criticized and condemned That is why Hong Kong Governor Chris Patten feels somewhat wronged Chris Patten , the last governor of Hong Kong , has been trying hard to preserve an actual colonial position in Hong Kong and revitalize the colonialist power and prestige of the old British Empire Unfortunately , all this is but a day dream This article is actually a confession by Chris Patten , who has been driven to the wall , to prove Hong Kong Governor Chris Patten loyalty to British colonialism
the Hong Kong people , of course the Hong Kong Chinese , what should be put first
the colonialist interests of the British Empire
the interests of the British Empire
